name: Create records in Betty Blocks based on events in Google Calendar
description:
Create new records in Betty Blocks based on new calendar events in Google Calendar. 

This template expects your Betty Blocks data model to have these properties:
1) Creator as text
2) Attendees as long text
3) Meeting Start as date time
4) Meeting End as date time
5) Summary as text
6) Status as text

The template is configured to check for new events (started) every hour. You can change this after setting up your template.
